summary: This is an email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York requesting that an attached application (likely a subpoena) be added to the next submission to magistrate court. It indicates ongoing legal proceedings related to the Epstein case in June 2020.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: The sender of the email, requesting that an application (subpoena) be added to the next submission to magistrate court.

events.title: Subpoena Application Submission Request
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney emails a request to add an attached subpoena application to the next submission to magistrate court.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated June 12, 2020, from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York.
The email requests that an attached application (identified in the filename as a subpoena) be added to the next submission to magistrate court.
This indicates ongoing legal proceedings, possibly related to the Epstein case, were active in mid-2020.
